name: Mexican Train Dominoes
description:
The ultimate domino game! Mexican Train Dominoes is fun and challenging. Win the gold and become a domino train master by scoring the fewest points possible against three opponents. You will have hours of addictive fun with these dominos.

Instructions are included in the game.

For any comments, questions, or concerns please contact dillydallygames@gmail.com

For bug reporting, please take a screen shot and send it to dillydallygames@gmail.com
